banner.title: HORD LP Staking Farm
banner.description: Deposit your HORD-ETH Uniswap Liquidity Pool tokens to earn extra Annual Percentage Yield!
farm.my_lp_deposited_description: The total number of Uniswap {lpToken} tokens you deposited
farm.my_hord_earned_description: The total number of HORD tokens you earned to date. You can claim those to your address when you retrieve your Uniswap HORD-ETH Liquidity Pool (LP) tokens.
farm.my_current_apy_description: The current interest yield on HORD-ETH LP tokens staked in this program.
farm.network_stats_description: Learn about the HORD LP Staking Farm, and track its results.
farm.rewards_tooltip_info: Amount of HORD tokens to be received during the Farming Program based on the current amount you're willing to stake.
farm_network_deposits_tooltip: The total number of HORD tokens currently staked
farm_network_locked_tooltip: The number of remaining HORD tokens still available as extra APY
farm_network_unlocked_tooltip: The total number of HORD tokens already earned as extra APY
farm_network_withdrawn_tooltip: The total number of extra APY HORD tokens already withdrawn
farm_network_duration_tooltip: The remaining time until the end of the extra APY program in weeks, days, hours and blocks.
farm_network_rate_tooltip:
The number of HORD token reward for each block.

 Block duration is approximately 13.3 seconds.
join.title: Join now
join.paragraph_1: The program rewards holders of Liquidity Pool tokens from the HORD-ETH liquidity pool on Uniswap with up to 1.500.000 HORD, distributed over a period of ~400.000 blocks (roughly 2 months). This reward is distributed proportionally to the amount of liquidity each person provides, therefore the APY per person depends on how many LP tokens they contribute to the Farm.
join.paragraph_2: A time-based reward system is implemented to further incentivize long term liquidity providing. People staking their HORD-ETH LP tokens on the Farm earn a cumulative reward for each block. The benefits are distributed at the confirmation of each block proportionally to the total amount of LP tokens in the Farm at that time.
join.paragraph_3: The longer you provide liquidity for, the higher the rewards!
join.audit: HORD LP Staking Farm Smart Contract Audit can be found <joinLink>Here</joinLink>
wallet.blocker: In order to see this page please connect your wallet
